dc-type.scope_note: Stores whether the End User Agreement has been accepted by an EPerson. Valid values; true, false
Stores the cookie preferences of an EPerson, as selected in last session. Value will be an array of cookieName/boolean pairs, specifying which cookies are allowed or not allowed.
Stores whether the EPerson is allowed to ignore the user agreement, useful for user account used by third party application. Valid values; true, false
